name: Containment Breach (jayplayzyeet)
description:
The game is about containment breach on a classified facility and the player must try to escape while trying to uncover the secrets and answer one important question "why am i here". The game uses player mechanics in order to progress through the level. There is one task for this game and its to escape.  Avoid enemies, enter different rooms and uncover what's truly happening in this mysterious facility. 

Important Note: Headphone Users Beware
